title: Error Detection: Nouns & Articles
description: Identify the grammatical errors related to nouns and articles.

questions.text: Identify the error: 'The sceneries of Kashmir are very playing.'
questions.explanation: 'Scenery' is an uncountable noun and has no plural form. Correct: 'The scenery of Kashmir is...'

questions.text: Identify the error: 'He gave me an advice regarding my career.'
questions.explanation: 'Advice' is uncountable. We cannot use 'an' directly. Use 'a piece of advice'.

options: Five loaves of bread were bought.
Five pieces of breads were bought.
questions.explanation: Bread is uncountable. To count it, we use counters like 'loaves of' or 'slices of'.
